title: Mario Draghi - Wikipedia
snippet: Prior to his appointment as prime minister, he served as the president of the European Central Bank (ECB) between 2011 and 2019. Draghi was also the chair of the Financial Stability Board between 2009 and 2011, and governor of the Bank of Italy between 2006 and 2011.

title: Mario Draghi | Biography, Prime Minister, & Facts | Britannica
snippet: Mario Draghi (born September 3, 1947, Rome, Italy) is an Italian economist who served from 2011 to 2019 as president of the European Central Bank (ECB), the financial institution responsible for making monetary decisions within the eurozone, ...

title: Mario Draghi
snippet: During his time at the Treasury, he chaired the committee that revised Italian corporate and financial legislation and drafted the law that governs Italian financial markets. He has also served on the boards of several banks and corporations.

title: Mario Draghi: His legacy after eight tumultuous years at the ECB
snippet: So now that Super-Mario is pulling ... crisis was already well underway when Mr Draghi took office as president of the ECB in November 2011....

title: Mario Draghi - European Central Bank
snippet: Prior to becoming President of ECB, Draghi worked at the World Bank, followed by a stint at Goldman Sachs and six years as Governor of Italy. He earned his nickname "Super Mario," for his heroic ability to navigate European politics.
